summary: Get sponsored discovery report adgroup level
description: Get sponsored discovery report adgroup level

query.name: useRtTable
query.description: It means that if endDate have selected today, and you need realtime data,then set useRtTable=true If useRtTable=false,it will not search realtime data

query.name: sort
query.description: sort column,we have provide some index to sort

query.name: order
query.description: ASC or DESC, other String is invalid

query.name: endDate
query.description: end date , date, format like yyyy-MM-dd

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/sponsor/solutions/report/getDiscoveryReportAdgroup')
request.add_api_parameter("campaignType", "1")
request.add_api_parameter("campaignName", "test")
request.add_api_parameter("campaignId", "101100033026398")
request.add_api_parameter("adgroupName", "test")
request.add_api_parameter("adgroupId", "2281484260")
request.add_api_parameter("itemId", "2281484260")
request.add_api_parameter("useRtTable", "true")
request.add_api_parameter("sort", "impressions")
request.add_api_parameter("pageNo", "1")
request.add_api_parameter("pageSize", "10")
request.add_api_parameter("order", "ASC")
request.add_api_parameter("startDate", "2023-11-12")
request.add_api_parameter("endDate", "2023-11-13")
response = client.execute(request, accessToken)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/sponsor/solutions/report/getDiscoveryReportAdgroup')
request.add_api_param('campaignType', '1')
request.add_api_param('campaignName', 'test')
request.add_api_param('campaignId', '101100033026398')
request.add_api_param('adgroupName', 'test')
request.add_api_param('adgroupId', '2281484260')
request.add_api_param('itemId', '2281484260')
request.add_api_param('useRtTable', 'true')
request.add_api_param('sort', 'impressions')
request.add_api_param('pageNo', '1')
request.add_api_param('pageSize', '10')
request.add_api_param('order', 'ASC')
request.add_api_param('startDate', '2023-11-12')
request.add_api_param('endDate', '2023-11-13')
response = client.execute(request, access_token)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)
